alert.note: Alert for Central Tularosa Basin; Eastern Black Range Foothills; Lowlands of the Bootheel; Northern Dona Ana County; Otero Mesa; Sierra County Lakes; Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; Southern Gila Foothills, Mimbres Valley; Southern Tularosa Basin; Southwest Desert, Lower Gila River Valley; Southwest Desert, Mimbres Basin; Uplands of the Bootheel; West Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 23 at 10:56PM MST until December 24 at 8:00PM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO 8 PM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Southern New Mexico and far west Texas. * WHEN...From 8 AM to 8 PM MST Friday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down. Areas of blowing dust are also possible in the afternoon which could reduce visibilities to 3 to 5 miles, mainly along and south of a line from Alamogordo to Deming.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
